Articles.Content:
As you can see, ground shadows are visible through the cockpit. I have this issue with all Mk2/Mk3 crew compartments/cockpits. 

Any thoughts?

![752fsZfh.png](http://i.imgur.com/752fsZfh.png)
This used to be caused by KVV but I think that problem was fixed a while ago, I haven't seen it in ages.
